resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205562</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">African Animals Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrikanischer Tier-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu Africain d'Animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Africano Dos Animais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Africano Degli Animali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρικανικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων ζώων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso Africano De los Animales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn to identify about 50 African mammals, birds, reptiles and insects. This is a simple picture-to-text mapping quiz. Very young learners can use it, but older children and grown-ups can also test or train their knowledge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie, ungefähr 50 afrikanische 
Säugetiere, Vögel, Reptilien und Insekte zu kennzeichnen. 
Dieses ist ein einfacher Abbildung-zu-Text, der Quiz abbildet. 
Sehr junge Anfänger können es verwenden, aber ältere Kinder 
und Erwachsene können ihr Wissen auch prüfen oder ausbilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez à identifier environ 50 mammifères, 
oiseaux, reptiles et insectes africains. C'est un image-à-texte
simple traçant le jeu. Les étudiants très jeunes peuvent 
l'utiliser, mais des enfants et des adultes plus âgés peuvent 
également tester ou former leur connaissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda identificar aproximadamente 50 mamíferos,
pássaros, répteis e insetos africanos. Este é um 
retrato-à-texto simples que traça o quiz. Os learners muito 
novos podem usá-lo, mas umas crianças e uns grown-ups mais velhos 
podem também testar ou treinar seu conhecimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari identificare circa 50 mammiferi, uccelli, 
rettili ed insetti africani. Ciò è un immagine-$$$-TESTO 
semplice che traccia il quiz. I principianti molto giovani 
possono usarli, ma i bambini ed i grown-ups più anziani possono anche
verificare o addestrare la loro conoscenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε να προσδιορίζετε τα περίπου 50 αφρικανικά 
θηλαστικά, τα πουλιά, ερπετά και έντομα. Αυτό είναι ένας 
απλός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων χαρτογράφησης εικόνα-$$$-ΚΕΙΜΈΝΩΝ. 
Οι πολύ νέοι αρχάριοι μπορούν να το χρησιμοποιήσουν, αλλά 
τα παλαιότερα παιδιά και grown-ups μπορούν επίσης να εξετάσουν
ή να εκπαιδεύσουν τη γνώση τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda identificar cerca de 50 mamíferos, 
pájaros, reptiles e insectos africanos. Esto es un 
cuadro-a-texto simple que asocia concurso. Los principiantes muy
jóvenes pueden utilizarlo, pero más viejos niños y adultos pueden 
también probar o entrenar a su conocimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:QEDOC EDUCATIONAL TEAM
FN:QEDOC EDUCATIONAL TEAM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205562</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107572</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/african-animals-quiz</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
